settings.text: As a former athlete and Army Captain, living a healthy and active life wasn't just my passion, it was my job. But today, as a father, husband, and entrepreneur, I know full well that staying fit doesn't always come easy. One day we feel like we have everything under control, then a couple late nights and skipped meals later, we're picking up the pieces and starting over. Day 1, again and again.

As a former athlete and Army Captain, living a healthy and active life wasn't just my passion, it was my job. But today, as a father, husband, and entrepreneur, I know full well that staying fit doesn't always come easy. One day we feel like we have everything under control, then a couple late nights and skipped meals later, we're picking up the pieces and starting over. Day 1, again and again.

Breakfast is more than just a meal - it's the fuel that sets the tone for how we're going to feel the rest of the day. But traditional breakfast foods are often loaded with sugar, artificial ingredients, and are little more than dessert in disguise.

At Over Easy, we believe that good nutrition and healthy mornings are fundamental to a healthy and happy life, so we're here to serve as the first step you take every morning on your personal wellness journey.
Whether you're a 5am warrior or simply looking for a better morning routine, start here. Welcome to Over Easy.

settings.heading: "We believe that good nutrition and healthy mornings are fundamental to a healthy and happy life"
Made for everyone, trusted by the best.

settings.text: Over Easy products are backed by leading dietitians and loved by some of the most elite athletes in the world.
Today, we are committed to helping everyone enjoy a better start to their day through delicious and complete nutrition breakfast foods.

settings.main_headline: You don’t take shortcuts. Neither do we.

settings.heading: Clean Ingredients
settings.text: All our products are made with clean and wholesome ingredients, and are free from artificial flavors, colors, and preservatives. We’re always dairy free, soy free, and gluten free. Only the best, every time.

settings.heading: Complete Nutrition
settings.text: Everything you need to start your day, and nothing you don’t. Complex carbs for energy, clean protein for lean muscle, collagen for your hair, skin, and nail, and fiber and vitamins for gut and immunity support.

settings.heading: Delicious Taste
settings.text: Rule #1 - food is meant to be enjoyed, so we will never release a product that isn’t downright delicious. No protein grittiness, no weird aftertaste, nothing to “get used to”. Simply Delicious, from the first taste to the last.

settings.headline: Meet the Team
settings.text: Want to join us? Reach out below.
